snippet: Rafael Nadal added a second Olympic tennis gold medal to all of those Grand Slam trophies, teaming with Marc Lopez to win the men's doubles championship for Spain at the Rio de Janeiro Games....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal added a second Olympic tennis gold medal to all of those Grand Slam trophies, teaming with Marc Lopez to win the men's doubles championship for Spain at the Rio de Janeiro Games.

headline.print_headline: Nadal, Lopez Win Olympic Tennis Men's Doubles for Spain
headline.main: Nadal, Lopez Win Olympic Tennis Men's Doubles for Spain
